Students who wish to minor in Information Technology (IT) must complete the following:   Course List         Code  Title  Hours     Prerequisite Courses  MATH 121 Precalculus Mathematics 5  Select one of the following: 3-4  IT 101 Java Programming for Information Technology  CS 107 Introduction to Computing and Programming  CS 141 Program Design II  Total Hours 8-9    Course List         Code  Title  Hours     Required Courses  IT 201 Introduction to Computer Configuration and Operating System Software 3  IT 202 Web and Multimedia Technology 3  IT 301 Networks and Distributed Computing Technology 3  IT 302 Database Administration and Installation 3  Total Hours 12            University of Illinois at Chicago   Apply Online | Contact Admissions | Privacy Statement Having problems accessing this site?
